prompt: A hard-hitting trap beat with a deep booming 808 bass and a crisp layered snare. The hi-hats run in rapid straight sixteenth notes, creating a tense mechanical feel. A dark moody synth lead floats over the top with an ominous atmosphere. Aggressive and minimal. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.prompt: A hard-hitting trap beat with a deep booming 808 bass and a crisp layered snare. The hi-hats run in rapid straight sixteenth notes, creating a tense mechanical feel. A dark moody synth lead floats over the top with an ominous atmosphere. Aggressive and minimal. Instrumental, no vocals.
